meta.name: ReSet Call Points
meta.description: Resettable call points for fire alarm systems
meta.heroDescription: The ReSet Call Point is a manual call point that simulates break glass activation whilst offering the user the benefits of a re-settable operating element. An activation indicator drops into view on activation. The unit is then simply reset with a key and is ready for immediate re-use.

options.01: #01 Conventional Fire Model with 470/680Ω Resistor, Series 01
options.05: #05 Sav-wire (2-wire) with 470/680Ω Resistor and Diode, Series 05
